languages.text: "Впрочем..." {n}Соломон искоса смотрит на вас.{/n} "Это ведь не значит, что я не вернусь к {mf|тому|той}, кто меня ждет. Обещаю, сколь долгий путь мне ни выпадет, сколь опасны ни будут преграды на нем — он всегда будет завершаться у твоего порога".

"However..." {n}Solomorne casts a sidelong look at you.{/n} "That doesn't mean I won't return to the one waiting for me. I promise — no matter how long the road, no matter how dangerous the obstacles, my journey will always end at your door."
languages.original_text: "Впрочем..." {n}Соломон искоса смотрит на вас.{/n} "Это ведь не значит, что я не вернусь к {mf|тому|той}, кто меня ждет. Обещаю, сколь долгий путь мне ни выпадет, сколь опасны ни будут преграды на нем — он всегда будет завершаться у твоего порога".

traits.locale_text: "However..." {n}Solomorne casts a sidelong look at you.{/n} "That doesn't mean I won't return to the one waiting for me. I promise — no matter how long the road, no matter how dangerous the obstacles, my journey will always end at your door."

"However..." {n}Solomorne casts a sidelong look at you.{/n} "That doesn't mean I won't return to the one waiting for me. I promise — no matter how long the road, no matter how dangerous the obstacles, my journey will always end at your door."

"However..." {n}Solomorne casts a sidelong look at you.{/n} "That doesn't mean I won't return to the one waiting for me. I promise — no matter how long the road, no matter how dangerous the obstacles, my journey will always end at your door."

"However..." {n}Solomorne casts a sidelong look at you.{/n} "That doesn't mean I won't return to the one waiting for me. I promise — no matter how long the road, no matter how dangerous the obstacles, my journey will always end at your door."

"However..." {n}Solomorne casts a sidelong look at you.{/n} "That doesn't mean I won't return to the one waiting for me. I promise — no matter how long the road, no matter how dangerous the obstacles, my journey will always end at your door."

languages.text: 「ですが…」{n}ソロモーンはちらりと横目であなたを見た。{/n}「待ってくれている人のもとに帰らないという意味ではありません。約束します。道がどれほど長かろうと、どれほど危険に満ちていようと、私の旅の終着点はいつだって、あなたのところです」
languages.original_text: "However..." {n}Solomorne casts a sidelong look at you.{/n} "That doesn't mean I won't return to the one waiting for me. I promise — no matter how long the road, no matter how dangerous the obstacles, my journey will always end at your door."

traits.locale_text: 「ですが…」{n}ソロモーンはちらりと横目であなたを見た。{/n}「待ってくれている人のもとに帰らないという意味ではありません。約束します。道がどれほど長かろうと、どれほど危険に満ちていようと、私の旅の終着点はいつだって、あなたのところです」

languages.text: "Allerdings ..." {n}Solomorne wirft dir einen Seitenblick zu.{/n} "Das bedeutet nicht, dass ich nicht zu der Person zurückkehre, die auf mich wartet. Ich verspreche – wie lang der Weg auch sein mag, wie gefährlich die Hindernisse, meine Reise wird immer an Eurer Tür enden."
languages.original_text: "However..." {n}Solomorne casts a sidelong look at you.{/n} "That doesn't mean I won't return to the one waiting for me. I promise — no matter how long the road, no matter how dangerous the obstacles, my journey will always end at your door."

traits.locale_text: "Allerdings ..." {n}Solomorne wirft dir einen Seitenblick zu.{/n} "Das bedeutet nicht, dass ich nicht zu der Person zurückkehre, die auf mich wartet. Ich verspreche – wie lang der Weg auch sein mag, wie gefährlich die Hindernisse, meine Reise wird immer an Eurer Tür enden."

languages.text: « Cependant... {n}Solomorne vous jette un regard en coin.{/n} Cela ne veut pas dire que je ne compte pas revenir auprès de {mf|celui|celle} qui attendra mon retour. Je vous le promets : peu importe la distance et les obstacles, ma mission ultime sera toujours de revenir à vos côtés. »
languages.original_text: "However..." {n}Solomorne casts a sidelong look at you.{/n} "That doesn't mean I won't return to the one waiting for me. I promise — no matter how long the road, no matter how dangerous the obstacles, my journey will always end at your door."

traits.locale_text: « Cependant... {n}Solomorne vous jette un regard en coin.{/n} Cela ne veut pas dire que je ne compte pas revenir auprès de {mf|celui|celle} qui attendra mon retour. Je vous le promets : peu importe la distance et les obstacles, ma mission ultime sera toujours de revenir à vos côtés. »

languages.text: «Sin embargo...». {n}Solomorne te mira de soslayo.{/n} «Eso no quiere decir que no vuelva con quien me espera. Le prometo que, por largo que sea el camino y peligrosos que sean los obstáculos, mi viaje siempre terminará frente a su puerta».
languages.original_text: "However..." {n}Solomorne casts a sidelong look at you.{/n} "That doesn't mean I won't return to the one waiting for me. I promise — no matter how long the road, no matter how dangerous the obstacles, my journey will always end at your door."

traits.locale_text: «Sin embargo...». {n}Solomorne te mira de soslayo.{/n} «Eso no quiere decir que no vuelva con quien me espera. Le prometo que, por largo que sea el camino y peligrosos que sean los obstáculos, mi viaje siempre terminará frente a su puerta».

languages.text: “不过……”{n}索罗蒙斜着眼，看了你一眼。{/n}“即便如此，我也依然会回到那个愿意等待我的人身边。我向你保证，无论路途多么遥远，无论要克服多少艰难险阻，我旅途的终点永远都会是你的门前。”
languages.original_text: "However..." {n}Solomorne casts a sidelong look at you.{/n} "That doesn't mean I won't return to the one waiting for me. I promise — no matter how long the road, no matter how dangerous the obstacles, my journey will always end at your door."

traits.locale_text: “不过……”{n}索罗蒙斜着眼，看了你一眼。{/n}“即便如此，我也依然会回到那个愿意等待我的人身边。我向你保证，无论路途多么遥远，无论要克服多少艰难险阻，我旅途的终点永远都会是你的门前。”

languages.text: "Ancak..." {n}Solomorne sana yan bir bakış atıyor.{/n} "Bu, beni bekleyen birine geri dönmeyeceğim anlamına gelmiyor. Söz veriyorum. Yol ne kadar uzun, engeller ne kadar tehlikeli olursa olsun... Yolculuğum daima senin kapında sona erecek."
languages.original_text: "However..." {n}Solomorne casts a sidelong look at you.{/n} "That doesn't mean I won't return to the one waiting for me. I promise — no matter how long the road, no matter how dangerous the obstacles, my journey will always end at your door."

traits.locale_text: "Ancak..." {n}Solomorne sana yan bir bakış atıyor.{/n} "Bu, beni bekleyen birine geri dönmeyeceğim anlamına gelmiyor. Söz veriyorum. Yol ne kadar uzun, engeller ne kadar tehlikeli olursa olsun, yolculuğum daima senin kapında sona erecek."
